---
title: "trash table5"
output: pdf_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = F, message=F, warning=F)
options(knitr.table.format = "latex")
library(here)
library(readxl)
library(tidyverse)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
library(dplyr)

```



```{r, results="asis", eval=T}
setwd(here("tables"))

corsabrev <- read_csv("table5abrev.csv")

cors<- tibble(variable=month.name,
              var1 = round(rnorm(12,0,0.3), 2),
              var2 = round(rnorm(12,0,0.35), 2),
              var3 = round(rnorm(12,0,0.25), 2))

cors %>%
  mutate(
    var1 = cell_spec(var1, bold = ifelse(var1 > .20 | var1 < -.20, TRUE, FALSE))
  ) %>% 
  kable("latex",escape=F)
```
